    1: from __future__ import annotations
    2: 
    3: from pre_commit import lang_base
    4: 
    5: ENVIRONMENT_DIR = None
    6: get_default_version = lang_base.basic_get_default_version
    7: health_check = lang_base.basic_health_check
    8: install_environment = lang_base.no_install
    9: in_env = lang_base.no_env
   10: run_hook = lang_base.basic_run_hook
